news.title: Elon Musk’s proposed new political party could focus on a few pivotal congressional seats
news.summary: Billionaire said his ‘America party’ would try to turn attainable House and Senate seats to decide major issues. Tesla and SpaceX’s multibillionaire CEO mused about that approach on Friday.

news.title: Trump to start TikTok sale talks with China, he says, with deal ‘pretty much’ reached
news.summary: Trump says he will start talking to China on Monday or Tuesday. President also says he may visit Xi Jinping or Chinese leader could come to US. Trump last month extended app sale deadline for third time.
